thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UDR Announces Q4 FFO Per Share $0.46

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UDR Announces Q4 FFO Per Share $0.46
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - UDR Inc:
* UDR ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $252.9 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.48 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.46 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.48 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q1 FFO PER SHARE $0.46 TO $0.48 * SEES Q1 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.44 TO $0.46 * SEES 2018 FFO PER SHARE $1.91 TO $1.95 * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.76 TO $1.80 * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.48 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.97 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
